attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: use the current recession to employ those builders losing their jobs to build more prisons and then do away with the 50% remission and make criminals see there are consequences to their crime. I would like to see those given life in prison to serve life in prison. I would also like to see the government take serious steps towards reducing crime, and banning the sale of pocket/flick knives, and raise the drinking age and ensure everybody gets their ID checked and it must be driving license or passport like in the US.
